I just told you, he touched me with his penis, like,

Oh, yeah. Yeah.

DETECTIVE: Okay. Can you describe?

[ sighs ] He used to have a back massage thing that it was like a ball on the end and it vibrated, and he would use that. And then, for his birthday, Nadia and I went shopping. And um, we got a bunch of toys, [laughs] which - I don't know how to tell you guys all this stuff without you thinking that I enjoyed this. Like, cause I had a choice whether or not to go shopping with her. I made this decision. I'm the one who did this stuff. But it doesn't mean that I felt right about it. Um, but yeah. Whatever was there. If he wanted to use something else, he would use whatever was there. Like,

DETECTIVE: Okay. What kind of vi - UI what color vibrators did he use?

Like white, and like - maybe it was like this color, but like blue, like you see the gray, like the grayish, on the pipe.

DETECTIVE: Right.

The pipe. Like grey, with like a little bit more blue, like that.

DETECTIVE: Okay.

And it had a white, like end, it had like a white handle and it had a ball on the end of it for giving back massages. Um and then, there
